stylesheets.Standart dark: QWidget#Form{background-color: #1b1c1c; }\QPushButton{background-color: #b4c1d1; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{background-color: white; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #b4c1d1; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: white; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: #000000; color: white; }\QLabel{color: white;}
stylesheets.Standart light: QWidget#Form{background-color: #373d3d; }\QPushButton{background-color: #b4c1d1; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{background-color: white; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #b4c1d1; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: white; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: #bfd6d6; color: black; }\QLabel{color: white;}
stylesheets.Monokai: QWidget#Form{background-color: #302f25; }\QPushButton{background-color: #4d4a41; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; color: #c4c3b9; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{background-color: #9e9d96; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #b4c1d1; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: white; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: #1f1e1a; color: #c4c3b9; }\QLabel{color: #c4c3b9;}
stylesheets.Monokai low: QWidget#Form{background-color: #1d1e1f; }\QPushButton{background-color: #3c3d40; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; color: #c4c3b9; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{background-color: #9e9d96; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #3c3d40; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: white; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: #28292b; color: #e0ded3; }\QLabel{color: #c4c3b9;}
stylesheets.Discord: QWidget#Form{background-color: #1d1e1f; }\QPushButton{background-color: #505257; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; color: #c4c3b9; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{background-color: #404245; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #c7b8b7; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: white; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: #323236; color: #e0ded3; }\QLabel{color: #c4c3b9;}
stylesheets.Spotify: \QWidget#Form{background-color: #121212;}\QPushButton{background-color: #292828; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; color: #bababa; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{color: #FFFFFF; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: #e3dede; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: black; color: #B3B3B3; }\QLabel{color: #B3B3B3; }\CustomItemWidget{backgroud-color: red; color: red; }\QSlider::groove:horizontal{height: 5px; border: 1px solid white; background: white; margin 2px 0; }\QSlider::handle:horizontal{background: #292828; border: 1px solid #292828; width: 9px; margin: -10px 0; border-radius: 10px;}\QSlider::handle:horizontal:hover{background: black;}
stylesheets.Test: \QWidget#Form{background-color: #121212;}\QPushButton{background-color: #292828; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; color: #bababa; height: 31px; }\QPushButton:hover{color: #FFFFFF; }\QLineEdit{background-color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 5px; font: bold 14px; height: 31px; }\QLineEdit:hover{background-color: #e3dede; }\QListWidget{border-radius: 10px; background-color: black; color: #B3B3B3; }\QLabel{color: #B3B3B3;}

tracks_area_stylesheets.Standart dark: QListWidget{font: 20px;}\QListWidget::item { border: 5px solid #505451; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #505451;}
tracks_area_stylesheets.Standart light: QListWidget { font: 20px;}\QListWidget::item { border: 5px solid #b4c1d1; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #b4c1d1;}
tracks_area_stylesheets.Monokai: QListWidget { font: 20px;}\QListWidget::item { border: 5px solid #36352e; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #36352e;}
tracks_area_stylesheets.Monokai low: QListWidget { font: 20px;}\QListWidget::item { border: 5px solid #2c2e30; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #2c2e30;}
tracks_area_stylesheets.Discord: QListWidget { font: 20px;}\QListWidget::item { border: 5px solid #48484f; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #48484f;}
tracks_area_stylesheets.Spotify: \QWidget#tracks_area{font: 30px; background-color: #121212;}\QWidget#tracks_area::item{border: 5px solid #121212; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #121212;}\QWidget#tracks_area::item:hover{background-color: #786262; color: #FFFFFF}\QWidget#tracks_area::item:selected{background-color: #786262; color: #FFFFFF}
tracks_area_stylesheets.Test: \QWidget#tracks_area{font: 30px; background-color: #121212;}\QWidget#tracks_area::item{border: 5px solid #121212; border-radius: 5px; margin: 8px; background-color: #121212;}\QWidget#tracks_area::item:hover{background-color: #786262; color: #FFFFFF}\QWidget#tracks_area::item:selected{background-color: #786262; color: #FFFFFF}\QWidget#playlists::item:hover{background-color: #786262; color: red}

like_button_stylesheets.Spotify: QPushButton { border: none; background-color: #121212; color: red; } QPushButton:focus { outline: none; }

rate_stylesheets.Spotify: \QLabel{font: 30px; background-color: #181818; border-radius: 5px}\QWidget#rate_track_name_lbl{background-color: #FFFFFF; color: black; font: bold 25px;}\QPushButton{font: 30px; height: 50px;}
